title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify
name: neotw-notify
author: oeyoews
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/readme","text":"* this is a nodejs plugin templates(neotw-notify)
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/config","<!-- tags":"$:/tags/RawMarkupWikified/BottomBody -->","type":"application/javascript","text":"`<script>
const btn = document.querySelector('#btn')

btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
  new Notify({
    status: 'success',
    title: 'Notify Title',
    text: 'Notify text lorem ipsum',
    effect: 'fade',
    speed: 300,
    customClass: '',
    customIcon: '',
    showIcon: true,
    showCloseButton: true,
    autoclose: false,
    autotimeout: 3000,
    gap: 20,
    distance: 20,
    type: 1,
    position: 'right top'
  })
})
`
`</script>`
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/icon","text":"<svg width="22pt" height="22pt" viewBox="0 0 128 128"
class="tc-image-plugin-generic-plugin tc-image-button" fill="#FF7F87"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M40.397 76.446V95.34h14.12l-.001-.005a6.912 6.912 0 005.364-11.593l.046-.023a6.912 6.912 0 119.979.526l.086.055a6.914 6.914 0 004.408 10.948l-.023.092h21.32V75.568l-.15.038a6.912 6.912 0 00-11.593-5.364l-.022-.046a6.912 6.912 0 11.526-9.979l.055-.086a6.914 6.914 0 0010.948-4.408c.079.018.158.038.236.059v-15.74h-21.32l.023-.094a6.914 6.914 0 01-4.408-10.947 10.23 10.23 0 00-.086-.055 6.912 6.912 0 10-9.979-.526l-.046.023a6.912 6.912 0 01-5.364 11.593l.001.005h-14.12v12.847A6.912 6.912 0 0129.5 59.843l-.054.086a6.912 6.912 0 10-.526 9.979l.023.046a6.912 6.912 0 0111.455 6.492zM64 0l54.56 32v64L64 128 9.44 96V32L64 0z"/></svg>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/id":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/id","text":"<button id="btn">Push Notification</button>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-notify/js","tags":"$:/tags/RawMarkup","type":"application/javascript","text":"<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/simple-notify@0.5.5/dist/simple-notify.min.css" />
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/simple-notify@0.5.5/dist/simple-notify.min.js"></script>
"}}}
